title: Astronomy before Copernicus.
brief_description: SUMMARY: Models and animated drawings are used to demonstrate the classical conceptions of the universe held by Pythagoreans, Plato, Eudoxus and Aristotle. C.A. Russell then examines in detail the basic constructions of the Ptolemaic astronomers. He conti
